Text: YES!!!!! Been waiting ages for this release!!! Thank you so much Politux!!! You just made my week!! :D
thank you so much for this! i love louis ck.

This is one of my favorite shows on TV. I think I like season 1 a bit better than this season. I'm glad FX gave him a season 3, I'm looking foward to that. Much appreciated uploader, i've already got half the season, but now I don't have to download each episode individually. This should hold me until some new episodes come out, because I'm sure FX won't show re-runs of the season at all after short while.
You are the master. Thanks for the upload.
ty so much for the up
